title: Best place for unique items
text: Best place to find unique quality items never had a problem with any of my purchases i highly recommend them

title: Had to cancel order because every time…
text: Had to cancel order because every time I try to pay for an item using my PayPal, RubyLane tries to charge me for a $900.00+ vase. Even when I then switch to a different payment ( credit card, debit card) it still tries to charge me for this same vase that I didn’t buy. I have had to go directly to the seller & waste countless emails & phone calls in order to finalize a sale.

title: Quick and user-friendly website
text: Quick and user-friendly website, making purchases a snap!  Good prices to be found, if you look for them.  Frequent Red-Tag sales a bonus!!

title: Speedy communication and shipping
text: I was impressed with the speed of the response I received, and the same day shipping. Also, the communication was clear.

title: Love this item
text: I sent the lady an email to make sure she was ok and not impacted by hurricane and she was not. This is the first time I have ordered from her but the item I ordered from her is a butterfly full of  rhinestones and other stones and it just called to me.

title: Fine dealers
text: Bought from a fine dealer who shipped the item faster than expected, and this exquisite glass was packed very professionally. Will be returning to Ruby Lane for more gifts for others.

title: Easy peasy
text: Easy peasy. Smooth operation. First transaction went well, seller responded nicely, purchase arrived safe n sound n beautiful.

title: Rubylane.com : # 1
text: I have used Rubylane.com for years to mainly buy jewelry. It has always been easy to find what I was interested in. Always been courteous and competent people to talk to - and their answers has always been quick in return. The items (which has been many over the years) has been top quality when received. I can only recommend Rubylane.comSincerely Kirsten

title: Best online shopping experience!
text: I bought a beautiful ring from here and although it was too big for me so I had to return it...it was the best experience I have ever had online shopping.  The seller was extremely nice and understating.  She made the purchase and return so easy.

title: Rosalie’s Steiff and more purchase.
text: Rosalie’s Steiff and more. Excellent communication and honest representation of products. The steiff fox terrier I purchased was exactly as described. Foxy was promptly shipped and I received tracking number to follow him. He came with a note to let Rosalie know he had arrived safely. I did and he not only arrived safely but he was packed with care to insure he wouldn’t be damaged in transit. Definitely a shop that cares about both its merchandise and their customers.

title: Happy Collector
text: I have bought a number of dolls from Maria and have been thrilled with all of them. Maria is excellent at getting back to me quickly, she packs dolls well, and is always happy to answer my questions. She is one of my favorite vendors on Ruby Lane.

title: Gumgumfuninthesun, a great seller to deal with!
text: Genuine, honest and very helpful. Gave me a good discount on the particular item I was interested in buying, and also put in a lot of effort in trying to get me an affordable shipping price. The parcel, posted from the USA to Australia, arrived in the shortest possible time. Thank you very much for all that you did in making this happen.

title: I have visited Ruby Lane to purchase a purse and had a great experience
text: I have visited Ruby Lane to purchase a purse and had a great experience. The staff was friendly and helpful, assisting me in finding the perfect purse that matched my style. The store was well-organized, making it easy to browse through their wide selection. I appreciated the quality of the products and found the prices to be reasonable. Overall, I was very satisfied with my purchase and would definitely shop there again.

title: Fun and easy way to find unique gifts…
text: Fun and easy way to find unique gifts and items

title: purchase from anne olmsted was…
text: purchase from anne olmsted was marvelous. easy to do, products arrived quickly and well packed. communication was quick and easy, and the products were in perfect shape, and lovely. i would purchase from anne olmsted without any concern. she is quick, thoughtful, careful, and has wonderful products. thank you so much. 5 star and more!

title: Totally overcharged for everything
text: Totally overcharged for everything . Insurance that I didn’t know about , the shipping charges , then sales TAX ? Not for TEXANS ON PRECIOUS METALS !   Never again ! $8.00 purchase into like $18.00 ?

title: Solid all around company
text: Relatively easy to search, lots of good vendors, a fantastic variety of products.

title: Ruby Lane is a relief from other…
text: Ruby Lane is a relief from other websites like Etsy, Chairish, etc. with thousands of offerings. While I shop them often, I love the better curated selections on Ruby Lane.  It's an easier, faster search.

title: Hard-To-Find crystal goblet on Ruby Lane
text: So thrilled to see this hard-to-find emerald-green crystal Val St Lambert “Gevaert” goblet on Ruby Lane! Of course it was an immediate purchase as my 1978 wedding collection now misses a few. The seller, Grandview Fine Tableware, was prompt and courteous, and the  goblet is on the way! Martha A.

title: Excellent Support
text: I contacted the shop owner about an issue with the shipment paperwork, but they ignored my email. However, when I reached out to Ruby Lane customer support, they responded sincerely and addressed the problem. While I’m disappointed with the shop's response, Ruby Lane’s handling of the situation was excellent and ultimately led to a safe shopping experience.

title: Quick, positive response from seller
text: We found an item where the seller did not ship to Canada.  A quick email to the seller in the evening, and a response the following morning letting me know she had changed the ad to allow international shipping, and the piece is on its way!Ruby Lane has been a go-to for us for a number of years, and we always have good experiences.

title: Have to wonder about their tech
text: For the longest time I was wondering why the website was down and finally just learnt from a friend on an antiques forum that they've actually blocked Singapore for "security reasons". Considering the country is Asia's wealthiest nation (and the world's 4th) this just makes no sense at all. Blocking numerous honest collectors who have good customer relationships with the sellers just because of the actions of a few bad apples. These bad apples exist in ALL countries -- would hate to think there was any racist bias here. Seems to me it would make more sense to strengthen the website's security and infrastructure?! Though it probably reflects on its security levels right now when it can't even handle the same concerns other major sites like Ebay, Etsy and Amazon have to deal with *roll eyes*

title: I made an offer to the seller Serene Jewelry Collections
text: I made an offer to the seller Serene Jewelry Collection , and they responded by stating that the item contains high-quality diamonds, subsequently declining my offer. I requested a detailed description of the diamonds, but instead of providing any factual information, the shop owner increased the item price by 37%. Their response was: *The price has been updated to reflect the current market price. In this environment, we have many pieces we have not updated the price on in several years. Thank you for your interest.Vivien and WilliamSerene Jewelry Collections on Ruby Lane”.This experience was disappointing as I was looking for transparency but received neither a description of the diamonds nor clear reasoning for the price increase.

title: Belleek purchase
text: Zudea Z answered all my questions and simplified the ordering process by explaining how to order online. My item was delivered pretty quickly and packaged very good resulting in no damages. Thank you!

title: Very easy, transparent, and quick shopping experience
text: I was looking for an out-of-production David Yurman ring, and Ruby Lane happened to have one in just my size. The ordering process was smooth and easy, and I got both a confirmation, a personal note, as well as shipping confirmation within a day of ordering, showing me exactly when my piece would arrive. The description was clear and accurate as well, and the piece I received was 100% as it looked in the photo and what I expected. I spent so little time looking for a hard-to-find item thanks to my experience with Ruby Lane.

title: The place for VCJ!
text: Always,if possible, I prefer to buy my vintage costume jewelry on this site.  Ruby Lane has such knowledgeable sellers and so many of them have been willing to work with me to make more expensive transactions become reality.  I’ve made many friends through my purchases here.  The vintage costume jewelry community are fabulous people with a gigantic love for bling!  This is the place, for sure!

title: Seemless Buying
text: Ruby Lane sends me notification of an item I put on my wish list each time it comes up - I buy it with no hassle from helpful sellers and the items - usually from USA - arrive in UK in good condition with the sellers helpfully sourcing lowest postal rates/ methods. And Ruby lane does not clog up my inbox with notifications otherwise. Excellent

title: It's all good!

title: Filters are Great!
text: I really like the filters, it helps reduce my search time. (My only suggested improvement would be to list what an item sold for, that would help educate buyers who want to learn more about the value of vintage pieces.)

title: Perfect in every way
text: Excellent description about the clock we bought. Easy to purchase through PayPal. Amazing instructions on unpacking the clock and its setup.We were told signature would be required, but the box was just delivered and set on the front porch. It is a lovely antique clock and working perfectly!

title: Shopping on Rubylane is easy and fun
text: Shopping on Rubylane is easy and fun.  I've been buying things from vendors here for over 20  years and I've told a lot of people about the site.  I don't believe there is another place like Rubylane online, with so many different shops and vendors, all with interesting and/or beautiful things.  I've rarely been disappointed with something I've bought on the site, and never with anything I've bought from Arnold Jewelers, from whom I have bought things before this.  It's a great shop with wonderful things and good prices and great customer service.In general, completing a transaction is also easy - this one was.

title: Carnelian ring
text: Helpful seller, my item was beautifully packaged and safely packaged for shipment.  Receipt of my item was timely.I do have to stress how beautifully my ring was wrapped.  The seller took time and care to create the best impression.  As someone who appreciates the aesthetics of the world around us - this meant a lot to me and was much appreciated.The ring is beautiful, the stone is perfect.  I know it will be a favorite.

title: Joseph of Hollywood
text: Hi, contacted from Scotland to ask if delivery possible,no problem . Good communication great service ,and wonderful items, will definitely be back for more, purchased item just as displayed on site . Very happyJohnathan Roberts

title: I purchased a beautiful charm bracelet…
text: I purchased a beautiful charm bracelet from Circa Vintage Jewelry on Ruby Lane. Barbara from Circa Vintage was responsive to my questions and organised international shipping. The bracelet arrived securely and in the same condition as described. I couldn't be happier with my bracelet and with the service provided by Barbara. 5 star experience - a highly recommended business. Would gladly purchase from Circa Vintage Jewelery again and the Ruby Lane platform was easy to use too. Thank you both!

title: Ruby Lane got back with me IMMEDIATELY…
text: Ruby Lane got back with me IMMEDIATELY to make the "payment" step very simple. Placed my order on tuesday with the regular shipping and received my order on friday...couldn't be any faster! At first I thought the shipping fee was a little high but it arrived so quickly and was packed the way I would have packed it myself I was extremely happy. Thank you, Ruby Lane!

title: Buyers beware and avoid ViaSophia Shop
text: Buyers be aware and beware!  Ruby Lane policy offers no protection for buyers even if the item is falsely or inaccurately described.  Buyer is responsible for all return shipping costs regardless of circumstance.  In my case specifically at ViaSophia shop, shop owner Devin Rench did not feel compelled to “do the right thing” and pay for return shipping charges and Ruby Lane policy leaves it to the discretion of the seller.  Furthermore, seller never answered emails and I eventually had to contact him by phone because Ruby Lane requires returns be handled thru Seller.

title: Great Service and Great Shops

title: I know I can trust sellers on Ruby…

title: I highly recommend this seller.
text: I'm very happy with my interaction with the seller.  She responded very quickly to my message regarding a "pending" sell.  I'm very happy with my purchase and would definitely buy things from her in the future.  I highly recommend this seller.

title: Do not like new layout format.
text: Do not like new layout format! More unnecessary clicks to view items or even getting to specific products in a category. Plus…don’t need confirmation that I have “Great taste” “nice find” etc. that’s only automated foolishness and comes off rather insulting actually. But I love Ruby Lane!! However recent changes haven’t improved anything. Feels like bored computer programmers changing things only the sake of changing.

title: Half happy with purchase
text: The hooked rug which I purchased through your website did not meet my expectations. Bonnie Boswell Antiques altered the colors of the pictures used to advertise the rug. The contrast was pushed to give the rug an almost black frame in the pictures. The actual rug has a mid-tone brown frame. The background of the motif looks cream/white in the ad pictures used, but the actual rug has a tan background. Bonnie Boswell should not alter the colors and contrast of what she is selling. Good points of the transaction: the rug is in good condition and it arrived promptly.

title: The only thing I don't like about Ruby…

title: Some Irksome Things About the Purchase Protocol
text: Actually, I believe your order process should be tweaked.  I put in a bid for a pair of whisky glasses at Douglas Lane Antiques.  I was told it wasn't accepted.  So, I wanted to offer more.  I sent a message to DLA asking if they'd accept my next higher bid.  Regina, at DLA, was very helpful and agreed to the price proposed.  Upon her direction, I went back to your website and attempted to key in the new agreed-upon price and then order the items.  But it wouldn't allow me to enter the agreed-upon price.  I got back with Regina who contacted you all. She was told that the system would not allow me to enter a new bid.  Thus, she was able to discount the item (to the price she and I agreed upon.  I then went back into the site to purchase it.  But I kept being cued to do so by using PayPal, which I didn't want to do.  I continued clicking on "change" (for the method of payment I wished to use).  But that didn't work.  Finally, I found directions that directed me to go ahead and press "PayPal" and then on a subsequent page, click on debit card/credit card.  I did that and it worked.It was kind of frustrating to navigate your purchase process due to the lack of clarity and efficiency in the way you have things set up.  However, again Regina at Douglas Lane Antiques was very helpful and thus, did a great job.  I look forward to receiving the glasses!

title: What you are doing right:
text: What you are doing right:Providing your customers with venders that have great product and variety. Easy purchasing system.Easy access. Appreciation of those venders who are forthright in their descriptions of merchandise. Luv it when a vendor says a stone is filled with glass. This gives you trust in the vender and what they are selling. What needs work:Some (very few) will write up a summary of what is being sold and the summary is not exactly on point. Example: two rings are offered as Alexandrite, one is alexandrite the other is a color changing sapphire. A sapphire is not alexandrite. It is not obvious till you read the listing underneath that you realize it is a sapphire. Otherwise, it’s billed as alexandrite.

title: AS A SELLER
text: What can we do to make your profitability better? ask RLCut your commission in half. It was so demoralizing to implement  that policy at the same time the internet tax became law. Maybe it was a bad decision by an out of touch CEO, but on the face it looked like betrayal. Something has changed at the top on RL and it trickled like acid rain down on everyone.  It was an all too familiar story and sadly - trust is gone. At least if costs had legitimately gone up, the starting number could have been 2%??  I used to grab people by the shirt sleeves and rattle their arms telling them about Ruby Lane! It was relaxing, I made friends, it was very profitable and I wanted people to open shops there to encourage the trajectory.. What happened? I do still recommend RL, but with many provisos and warnings - which is too bad. If you could wish for one thing that Ruby Lane could change to make your selling experience better, what would it be?Get rid of image gallery. It takes me 3 minutes to list  on Ebay. It takes me an hour to list on RL. Whoever thought that having to load your pictures twice was a time saver? And who decided to make it so every photo you attach to the listing DISAPPEARS from the image gallery and if you need that photo you have to load it AGAIN? Sellers should have the discretion to delete the pictures per their convenience, not have to worry that if they make a mistake it will be another 10 minutes of their day wasted and to make matters worse, RL doesn't even save the draft if I close the window by accident or RL signs me out. NONE of this would ever happen if you were simply taking photos from your PC or phone. Besides, it's in the best interest of the sellers to take excellent photos.  If a seller is not representing the quality that RL requires it could be dealt with separately.  The AIP as well is all negativity. It seems that the entire image processing part of RL was designed to complicate and frustrate. And the images that result are low quality, amateurish and quite obviously not processed in the US.

text: I have purchased jewelry through Ruby Lane for over 10 years now. I have never been disappointed in a purchase. Customer service is prompt and personal.
